name: calculator-with-simple-backend
description: - [ ] A calculator app should be created in React framework   - [ ] The app have to use the base operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)   - [ ] The application should support decimal point   - [ ] The app should have a clear button   - [ ] The app should have memory read and write button   - [ ] The app should use backend API for memory operations

scripts.start: concurrently "cd calculator-backend && node server.js" "cd calculator-frontend && npm run start"
